about.title: About Ec stem
about.subtitle: Nurturing tomorrow's innovators through hands-on STEM education
about.description: Ec stem is an early childhood (4-6 years old) enrichment provider dedicated to making STEM — Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics — fun, hands-on, and meaningful for young learners. Through structured, age-appropriate programmes, children explore and create using interactive kits that spark curiosity and build essential skills like problem-solving, creativity, and teamwork. Aligned with the MOE NEL Framework, Ec stem delivers engaging learning experiences that nurture confident, curious, and future-ready innovators from a young age.

programs.title: Our STEM Programs
programs.subtitle: Age-appropriate STEM learning experiences designed for every stage of development

toddler.title: Early Explorers
toddler.description: Children explore building blocks, learning to interlock pieces and create simple structures. Focused on fine motor skills, problem-solving, and curiosity, this stage lays the foundation for hands-on STEM learning.

preK.title: Curious Creators
preK.description: Children use simple tools like screws to connect blocks securely, developing coordination, precision, and early engineering thinking. Creativity and collaboration are nurtured through guided and open-ended construction challenges.

kindergarten.title: Super Solvers
kindergarten.description: Children engage with gears and mechanisms, exploring a new mechanism concept in each lesson. Hands-on experimentation builds problem-solving, critical thinking, and engineering understanding in a fun, interactive way.

founder.title: A Message from Our Founder
founder.quote:
I firmly believe that gamified exploration is the key to igniting a lifelong passion for learning. At Ec stem, guided by Singapore's NEL Framework, we meticulously design every curriculum to transform children's curiosity into the ability to solve real-world problems, empowering them to become the creators of tomorrow.

I look forward to collaborating with visionary principals and educators to lay a dynamic and solid foundation for children's future.
founder.name: Ms Huang
founder.description: An innovator deeply rooted in early childhood education, dedicated to seamlessly integrating forward-thinking STEM education concepts into Singapore's kindergarten classrooms.

team.title: Meet Our Teachers
team.heading: Behind every little inventor... is a big heart ❤️
team.subtitle: Our passionate team combines deep expertise in early childhood development with cutting-edge STEM knowledge.

msHuang.name: Teacher Clairabel
msHuang.description: With a diploma in Early childhood and ECDA Commendation award recipient, Clairabel strives to nurture the young explorers by equipping them with creativity, confidence and practical skills through STEM activities. She believes that no idea is too small and no problem too big. She aspires to take learning to greater heights through the stem curriculum.

jennifer.name: Teacher Wan Rong
jennifer.description: A dedicated educator with a Diploma in Early Childhood Education and undergraduate in BSc Psychology. With five years of experience in the early childhood field, she believes in lifelong learning and in nurturing each child's natural curiosity and love for learning. She values meaningful play as a powerful foundation for developing essential 21st century skills such as problem solving, collaboration, and creativity, which help children build the executive functioning skills needed for future success.

david.name: Teacher Jayne
david.description: With a Professional Diploma in Early Childhood Care and Education (Childcare) and over 8 years of experience in the early childhood field, Jayne is passionate about nurturing young minds through hands-on learning. She believes that children learn best by exploring and experiencing the world around them. To her, learning should be fun and enjoyable, sparking curiosity and cultivating a lifelong love for discovery. Jayne is dedicated to supporting children in developing confidence, problem-solving skills, and a sense of wonder as they explore the world of STEM.

flynne.name: Teacher Flynne
flynne.description: Flynne is passionate about sparking young minds and cultivating their natural curiosity through STEM programmes. She fosters critical thinking and problem-solving skills while encouraging exploration and creativity. By embracing STEM education, Flynne aims to inspire confidence, foster a love for learning, and support the holistic development of every child under her care.

whatIsEcStem.question: What is Ec stem and what do you do?
whatIsEcStem.answer: Ec stem is Singapore's trusted partner for early childhood STEM education. We provide specialized robotics training, hands-on science programs, and comprehensive STEM enrichment services directly to childcare centres across Singapore.

howItWorks.question: How does the partnership with childcare centres work?
howItWorks.answer: We work closely with childcare centres to integrate age-appropriate STEM programs into their existing curriculum. Our experienced educators visit your centre regularly to deliver engaging, hands-on learning experiences that complement your educational goals.

whyChooseUs.question: Why should we choose Ec stem over other education providers?
whyChooseUs.answer: We specialize exclusively in early childhood STEM education with experienced educators, age-appropriate curriculum, proven track record with childcare centres, and ongoing support. Our programs are designed specifically for young learners aged 18 months to 6 years.

safetyConcerns.question: Are your STEM programs safe for young children?
safetyConcerns.answer: Absolutely! All our programs use age-appropriate, child-safe materials and equipment. Our educators are trained in early childhood development and safety protocols. We ensure every activity meets the highest safety standards for young learners.

costEffective.question: Is it cost-effective to partner with Ec stem?
costEffective.answer: Yes! Partnering with us is more cost-effective than hiring specialized STEM staff. You get expert educators, curriculum, materials, and ongoing support without the overhead costs of recruitment, training, and resource management.

getStarted.question: How can we get started with Ec stem?
getStarted.answer: Simply contact us for a free consultation! We'll discuss your centre's needs, explain our programs, and arrange a trial session. There's no obligation, and we'll work with you to create a customized STEM education plan for your centre.
